definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
poe divination, a traditional Chinese divination method where a pair of crescent-shaped wooden or bamboo blocks is thrown on the ground, with the positions of the blocks determining the divine answer

sentences.english: Another is to throw two prayer blocks that look like crescent moons.
sentences.chinese: 另一个方法则是抛掷两个新月状的筊杯。

sentences.english: Spring flowers to the blessing of the goddess of mercy temple son, repeatedly throw st the skin have to Yin under the skin.
sentences.chinese: 春花到观音庙祈福求子，多次掷下圣筊也只得阴筊。

definition: pair of hemispherical objects used in divination
(arch.) religious ritual on setting out for war
scull (single oar worked from side to side over the stern of a boat) (free word)
name of poisonous snake in ancient text
pair of mussel-shaped objects thrown on the ground for divination purposes
